verses.verse: Now it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> when <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H4480>slaughter<s%> <S%H5221><s%> of <S%H99999><s%> the <S%H6002>Amalekites,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H3427>abode<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H6860>Ziklag;<s%>

It came even to pass on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H376>that<s%>, behold, a man <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul<s%> with his <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H7167>torn<s%>, and <S%H127>earth<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>: and so it <S%H935>was<s%>, when he came to <S%H1732>David<s%>, that he <S%H5307>fell<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and did <S%H7812>bow<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H935>him<s%>, From from where come <S%H559>you<s%>? And he said unto <S%H4264>him<s%>, Out of the camp of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> am I <S%H4422>escaped<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4100>him<s%>, How went the <S%H1697>matter<s%>? I pray <S%H5046>you<s%>, tell <S%H559>me<s%>. And he answered, That the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H5127>fled<s%> from the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H7235>many<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> also are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> and <S%H4191>dead<s%>; and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> are dead <S%H4191>also<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the young <S%H5288>man<s%> that <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3045>him<s%>, How know you that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> be <S%H4191>dead<s%>?

And the young <S%H5288>man<s%> that <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H559>said<s%>, As I <S%H7136>happened<s%> by <S%H7122>chance<s%> upon <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa<s%>, <S%H7586>behold<s%>, Saul <S%H8172>leaned<s%> upon his <S%H2595>spear<s%>; <S%H7393>and<s%>, behold, the chariots and <S%H1167>horsemen<s%> followed hard after <S%H1692>him<s%>.
And when he <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H7200>him<s%>, he saw <S%H7121>me<s%>, and called unto <S%H559>me<s%>. And I answered, Here am I.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, Who are you? And I answered <S%H6003>him<s%>, I am an Amalekite.

He <S%H559>said<s%> unto me <S%H5975>again<s%>, Stand, I pray <S%H4191>you<s%>, upon me, and kill <S%H7661>me<s%>: for anguish is <S%H270>come<s%> upon <S%H5315>me<s%>, because my life is yet whole in me.

So I <S%H5975>stood<s%> upon <S%H4191>him<s%>, and killed <S%H3045>him<s%>, because I was sure that he could not <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he was <S%H5307>fallen<s%>: and I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5145>crown<s%> that was upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and the <S%H685>bracelet<s%> that was on his <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and have <S%H935>brought<s%> them here unto my <S%H113>lord<s%>.
Then <S%H1732>David<s%> took <S%H2388>hold<s%> on his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7167>tore<s%> <S%H582>them<s%>; and likewise all the men that were with him:

And they <S%H5594>mourned<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>, and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> until <S%H6153>evening<s%>, for <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and for <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and for the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; because they were <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the young <S%H5288>man<s%> that <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, From where are you? And he answered, I am the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H376>stranger<s%>, an <S%H6003>Amalekite<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3372>him<s%>, How were you not afraid to stretch <S%H7971>forth<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H4899>anointed<s%>?

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the young <S%H5288>men<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H5066>near<s%>, and <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon <S%H5221>him<s%>. And he struck him that he <S%H4191>died<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1818>him<s%>, Your blood be upon your <S%H7218>head<s%>; for your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> has <S%H6030>testified<s%> against <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, I have <S%H4191>slain<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6969>lamented<s%> with this <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> over <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and over <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>:

(Also he <S%H559>told<s%> them <S%H3925>teach<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the use of the <S%H7198>bow<s%>: <S%H3789>behold<s%>, it is written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H3477>Jasher<s%>.)
The <S%H6643>beauty<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H2491>slain<s%> upon your high <S%H1116>places<s%>: how are the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%>!

<S%H5046>Tell<s%> it not in <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, <S%H1319>publish<s%> it not in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H831>Askelon<s%>; lest the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, lest the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H5937>triumph<s%>.

You <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1533>Gilboa<s%>, let there be no <S%H2919>dew<s%>, neither let there be <S%H4306>rain<s%>, upon <S%H7704>you<s%>, nor fields of <S%H8641>offerings<s%>: for there the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> is vilely cast <S%H1602>away<s%>, the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, as though he had not been <S%H4899>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

From the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%>, from the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7734>turned<s%> not <S%H268>back<s%>, and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> not <S%H7387>empty<s%>.

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> were <S%H157>lovely<s%> and <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> in their <S%H2416>lives<s%>, and in their <S%H4194>death<s%> they were not <S%H6504>divided<s%>: they were <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than <S%H5404>eagles<s%>, they were <S%H1396>stronger<s%> than <S%H738>lions<s%>.

You <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, weep <S%H1058>over<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, who <S%H3847>clothed<s%> you in <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, with other <S%H5730>delights<s%>, who <S%H5927>put<s%> on <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> upon your <S%H3830>apparel<s%>.
How are the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H4421>battle<s%>! O <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, you were <S%H2491>slain<s%> in your high <S%H1116>places<s%>.

I am <S%H6887>distressed<s%> for <S%H251>you<s%>, my brother <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>: <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H5276>pleasant<s%> have you been unto <S%H160>me<s%>: your love to me was <S%H6381>wonderful<s%>, passing the <S%H160>love<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%>.
How are the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%>, and the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H6>perished<s%>!
